mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sys_function t1 WHERE EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM sys_role_function t2 WHERE EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM sys_user_role t3 WHERE userId=#{id} AND t3.roleId=t2.roleId ) AND t2.functionId = t1.id) AND type = 1 ORDER BY parentId

SELECT * FROM sys_function t1 WHERE EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM sys_role_function t2 WHERE EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM sys_user_role t3 WHERE userId IN (SELECT id FROM sys_user WHERE name=#{name}) AND t3.roleId=t2.roleId ) AND t2.functionId = t1.id) AND type = 1 ORDER BY parentId
